params.manifestId: The manifest ID to look up

params.ruleId: The rule ID to look up

returns._0: ruleIds The array of rule IDs

returns.result: The parse result with manifest ID

params.description: Description of what the rule checks
params.name: Human-readable name of the rule

params.manifest: The manifest ID to report on

returns.ruleCount: The number of rules validated against

params.concepts: The concept definitions involved in the deployment
params.syncs: The sync definitions involved in the deployment

returns.result: The validation result with deployment plan

getRule(bytes32).notice: Get a validation rule by ID

list().notice: list - returns all registered validation rules

parse(string).notice: parse - parses raw deployment configuration into a manifest

report(bytes32).notice: report - generates a validation report for a manifest

validate(bytes32,bytes[],bytes[]).notice: validate - validates a parsed manifest against registered rules
